info.description: The CMS System Census Core API consists of interfaces specific to System Census Web Application, which captures the information of several business applications at CMS. This API resources are organized by the web application views (pages). System Census Core API internally leverages the broader Cedar Core API for several CRUD operation.
info.title: System Census Core API

get.description: Retrieve budget and contracts information by system ID.

parameters.name: systemId
parameters.description: ID of system to retrieve budget and contracts information.

post.summary: Add (or update) budget and contracts data
post.description: Add  (or update) budget and contracts information for a system.

get.summary: Retrieve a list of data exhange status
get.description: Retrieve a list of data exchange status based on query criteria

parameters.name: systemId
parameters.description: ID of the system that the data exchange is associated with

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction of the data exchange, relative to the systemId provided

post.summary: Add (or update) a list of data exhange status
post.description: Add (or update) a list of data exchange status for a given system

delete.summary: Delete a list of data exchange status
delete.description: Delete a list of data exchange status based on the exchange IDs

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An ID of one or more data exchanges whose status should be deleted

get.description: Retrieve data exchange notes by exchange ID

parameters.name: exchangeId
parameters.description: ID of data exchange whose notes to retrieve

delete.summary: Delete a list of data exchange notes
delete.description: Delete a list of data exchange notes based on the exchange IDs

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An ID of one or more data exchanges whose notes should be deleted

get.description: Retreives the list of Systems that were collected as part of System Census till to date. It contains high-level information for each of the System including the point of contacts

parameters.name: includeInSurvey
parameters.description: Include only system census eligible systems

parameters.name: idsOnly
parameters.description: Return only system ids and names

parameters.name: belongsTo
parameters.description: Return only sub-systems of the system ID provided

get.description: Retrieve the system maintainer based on query criteria

post.summary: Add data from a given page
post.description: Add data from a given page

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Page detail information to be added to CEDAR

get.summary: Retrieve a list of potential reviewers
get.description: Reviewers are CMS employees responsible for verifying the accuracy and completeness of the System Census Survey data each year. There are two types of reviewers, QA and DA. The list of potential reviewers is returned by this endpoint and can be filtered by 'type'

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of reviewers to be returned. Either 'QA', 'DA', or 'null'. Null will return both QA and DA reviewers.

post.summary: Add a list of potential reviewers
post.description: Reviewers are CMS employees responsible for verifying the accuracy and completeness of the System Census Survey data each year. There are two types of reviewers, QA and DA. Additional reviewers may be added via this endpoint. 'id' is ignored for POSTs. 'userName' and 'fullName' are required.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of notes to add to a system

delete.summary: Delete a list of potential reviewers
delete.description: Reviewers are CMS employees responsible for verifying the accuracy and completeness of the System Census Survey data each year. There are two types of reviewers, QA and DA. One or more reviewers may be deleted via this endpoint. Either 'id' or 'userName' must be required. All else is ignored.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of notes to add to a system

get.summary: Retrieve a list of notes for a given system.
get.description: Retrieve a list of notes based on a system ID and page name.

post.description: Add a list of notes for a system. This interface takes an array of Notes documents.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of notes to add to a system

delete.description: Delete a list of notes based on the note's ID(s).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An ID of one or more notes

get.summary: Retrieve a list of persons from LDAP
get.description: Retrieve a list of persons from LDAP based on query criteria
Retrieve the URLs that are used to access the system, for a given System ID

parameters.name: systemId
parameters.description: ID of system to retrieve system component information about

post.description: Allows to update or delete the URLs from the existing list of URLs that are used to access the system

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Page detail information to be added to CEDAR

get.description: Retrieves the deployment information  including the data center or cloud service provider information, for given System ID

parameters.name: systemId
parameters.description: ID of the system that the deployment(s) is associated with

post.description: Add (or update) the deployment information including the data center or cloud service provider. If an update, Deployment ID and Deployment Element ID are required.

get.description: Retrieves the list of software products such as operating sytems, database, middleware etc. and versions that are used by the system to perform business functions

post.summary: Add a software product that is used by the system
post.description: Add the software product and version details that is used by the system. Software produt can be operating sytems, database, middleware etc. that are needed to perform business function

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Page detail information to be added to CEDAR

get.description: Retrieve a list of status based on a system ID and survey page name

parameters.name: summarize
parameters.description: Whether to return a summarized list per system

post.description: Add a list of survey pages and it's status for the system

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of status to add to a system

delete.summary: Delete a list of system status
delete.description: Delete a list of statuses for given the list of the status ID(s)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: An ID of one or more status

parameters.name: soft
parameters.description: Whether to perform a soft instead of a hard delete

get.description: Retrieves data exchange information by system ID. A data exchange can be between two CMS IT systems or between a CMS system and a non-CMS stakeholder such as the Social Security Administration.

parameters.name: systemId
parameters.description: ID of system to retrieve data exchange information about

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of the data exchanges to be retrieved

post.description: Add  (or update) data exchange information for a system. A data exchange can be between two CMS IT systems or between a CMS system and a non-CMS stakeholder such as the Social Security Administration. For updates, exchangeId is required.

get.description: Retrieve the system lifecycle information such as development methodology, requirements management, state of development and deployment etc.

post.summary: Add system lifecycle information for a system
post.description: Add system lifecycle information such as development methodology, requirements management, state of development and deployment etc.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Page detail information to be added to CEDAR

delete.summary: Delete the Enterprise Release and Release Item records
delete.description: Delete the Enterprise Release and Release Item records

get.summary: Retrieve the sub-systems or components information of the system
get.description: Retrieves the information for list of sub-systems or components that make up the overall system

parameters.name: systemId
parameters.description: ID of system to retrieve system component information about

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Version of system to retrieve system component information about

post.summary: Add, update or delete system components
post.description: Add, update or delete any of the sub-systems or components information of the system

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Page detail information to be added to CEDAR

get.summary: Retrieve business owner basic information data
get.description: Retrieve business owner basic information by system ID.

post.summary: Add (or update) business owner basic information data
post.description: Add  (or update) business owner basic information data for a system. If an update, ID is required.

name.example: Accountable Care Organization Management System v.1.0 (COOP DR)

contractDeliverableId.description: Contract deliverable ID tying this budget project to the contract

deleted.description: Flag indicating whether this budget was dissociated with the contract

id.description: OFM budget internal ID in system of record

projectId.description: OFM budget project ID in system of record

deleted.description: Boolean indicator for deleting the URL entry

updated.description: Boolean indicator for updating the URL entry

Url.description: List of URLs that are to be updated or deleted based on the above flags

exchangeDescription.example: Reference data on vendors acting on behalf of insurance issuers

exchangeName.example: Acumen Web Portals 1.0 >> Drug Data Processing System 1.0

description.example: This is a CMS System decription

deleted.description: Flag indicating whether this contract was deleted by the user

updated.description: Flag indicating whether this contract was added or updated by the user

haveEnterpriseDataLakePlan.example: Enumeration of (Now | In 1 Year | In 3 Years | No Plans | What is EDL)

netAccessibility.example: Accessible to a CMS-internal network only

devWorkDescription.example: The type of development work underway...

providesVerCodeAccess.description: A boolean flag to indicate Does this URL provide access to a versioned code repository?

urlHostingEnv.description: A string that contains What hosting environment is this URL for?

urlApiWaf.description: A boolean flag to indicate whether application is behind a Web Application Firewall (WAF)

link.description: A valid and full system URL

urlId.description: Unique key that uniquely identified the URL in database

urlApiEndpoint.description: A boolean flag to indicate whether URL is an API Endpoint

haveEnterpriseDataLakePlan.example: Enumeration of (Now | In 1 Year | In 3 Years | No Plans | What is EDL)

netAccessibility.example: Accessible to a CMS-internal network only

devWorkDescription.example: The type of development work underway...

funding.example: Most of this funding is directly and only for this system (over 80%)
funding.description: Description of the allocation of this budget to the system in question

fundingId.description: Cross-reference ID for relationship between budget project and application in system of record

deleted.description: Flag indicating whether this budget was deleted by the user

id.description: OFM budget internal ID in system of record

projectId.description: OFM budget project ID in system of record

updated.description: Flag indicating whether this budget was added or updated by the user

projectTitle.example: Consolidated Information Technology Infrastructure Contract (CITIC) - Baltimore Data Center Operations
projectTitle.description: Project Title in system of record
